𒀊 AB ≈ 𒐂𒁹 ≈ 𒇹𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒌋𒋰𒁹 ⇔ 𒍨 ( in ligatures ) vs 𒄢 𒋰𒋰
𒀜 ≈ 𒋰𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒁹 ≈ 𒀊 #abu™ Opa 𒀜𒀜 Papa

𒀜 ᶠAT father 𒀊 fattener

𒀊 ≈ 𒀕 gunu 𒀍

𒀊 AB ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒑖 ≈ 𒀮 NAB

𒀊 1. abbe ⋍ papa ⋍ father 𒀊𒁀 Opa 𒀋 ‘elder’
𒀊 2. ab < heb = water abyss
𒀊 3. ab < opening / window
𒀊 4. ab < abode 𓉔𓉐 altar 𒋢𒀊 = tent
𒀊 ⇔ both beide > abode Beith 𒀕 (city) 𓉐

AP 𒀖 ⋍ 💧 AB 𒀊 water 𒀀 💧
AP 𒀖 ≈ 𒌋𒋰 ≠ 𒌋𒑙 ≈ 𒀫 ⇔ 𒋰𒌋𒋰𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒁹 𒀊 AB ⇔ 𒍨

𒀊 AB < 𓎛 𓃀 𓃀 𓈅 𓈗 h₂ep < sap šap šá-ap-pan-na saft ⇔ sirup

𒀊 AB «open» : “window” aperiō 𓉐 𒁀

𒀊𒌅 ap-tu apertūra (window) opening open

𒀊 𒎗 ab.har 𒉈 bar₅

𒀀𒀊𒁀 a-ab-ba a'abak "sea(water)" AP 𒀖 ⋍ 💧 AB 𒀊 𒀀 💧 Ob Обь Օբ Ōb ⇔ Bach, Bahrain water
𒍪𒀊 abzu apsû abyss 𒌤

𒀊 ≠ 𒆯 KUD good 𓇜 ⇔ cod carp

𒀊𒋼𒂊𒈠 abtiema < apartma > open

𒁀 baʳ part 𒁀 ≈ 𓍏 𒁀 ≈ 𒀊 ap 𒁀 ≈ 𓄋 𓊪 𓏴 open… 𒁀 ≈ 𓂘 פָּתוּחַ patúakh 𓊪 𓎼 𓂘

𒀊𒊒𒋢 ab-ru-su part, separate
